nodes.text: Kovic, known as the Shadow of Corellia, was a male Houk who led the Coronas gang operating in Coronet City on the planet Corellia during the Galactic War. In the aftermath of the Battle of Corellia, he and his boss, the corrupt politician Harmon Torvix, took control of the Black Hole hypermatter refinery, and fought the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire for control of the region. Kovic was killed in battle with Republic forces atop the HyperMatter Tower.

Kovic appears as the final boss of the Republic Heroic mission "Chasing the Shadow," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
